name: libpipeline
description:
libpipeline is a C library for manipulating pipelines of subprocesses in
a flexible and convenient way.

dependencies.name: pkgconfig
dependencies.description:
pkg-config is a helper tool used when compiling applications and
libraries

dependencies.name: check
dependencies.description:
Check is a unit testing framework for C. It features a simple interface
for defining unit tests, putting little in the way of the developer.
Tests are run in a separate address space, so both assertion failures
and code errors that cause segmentation faults or other signals can be
caught. Test results are reportable in the following: Subunit, TAP, XML,
and a generic logging format.

dependent_to.name: man-db
dependent_to.description:
man-db is an implementation of the standard Unix documentation system
accessed using the man command. It uses a Berkeley DB database in place
of the traditional flat-text whatis databases.
